data.text:
Hmm hmm… Dad, ya never change, do ya? 
Hahaa, even th' brats are tsukkomi-ing.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text: Looks like they're enjoyin' the souvenirs too!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text: Yep. They also wrote somethin' for ya. Take a look.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Several different handwritings were in the letter. The sentences 
written mainly in hiragana were probably Tamamo Cross' siblings'.

A few days ago, [Tracen Academy, Enrolled for a Day!] had aired 
on TV. Tamamo Cross had appeared in it while running, and they 
had written their impressions about that.

Th' script said ta run side-by-side with Oguri 'n 
Inari. They told us ta jus' take it easy, but that 
ain't us so we ended up goin' full throttle.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: So the scene turned in to a competition
choices.processed: <size=42>So the scene turned in to a competition</size>

choices.text: So the scene turned in to a competition
choices.processed: <size=42>So the scene turned in to a competition</size>

data.text:
Yeah. Dad was impressed by ya too. 
Yer th' reason she's become so amazin', she said.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
[Trainer and "White Lightning", quake th' heavens with thunder], 
she said! Don' go betrayin' Dad's expectations, ya hear!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text: Hahahaa, if that's th' case, I'll write 'em that.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Right, I'll send the brats some more snacks. 
Meanin' some shoppin', wanna come with?
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Help me pick some snacks ta send 'em. I'll let 'em know in th' 
letter, and it'll do for an introduction, don't ya think?
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Let's see… last time they said this chocolate snack was good. 
There's even a limited edition peach flavor?
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Ah, these cookies're great, there's alot in there! 
Th' red box makes 'em look real fancy!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Now that I get a good look, there's lotsa new brands ain't there? 
…Trainer, got any suggestions?
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: The cookies in that red box are great!

data.text:
Her siblings probably have a hearty appetite. If that's the case, 
then snacks with quantity are probably best, so I suggest that.

Got it! In tha' case, th' cookies and a family size 
pack of rice crackers are th' right choice…
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Hmmmm… maybe I should get 'em th' one they liked last time too. 
If I'm thrifty this month, I can probably get them both th' 
regular an' peach flavor ones.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: Don't force yourself if your budget's tight…
choices.processed: <size=38>Don't force yourself if your budget's tight…</size>

data.text:
I ain't forcin' myself. I only have to be a little thrifty. 
No different from how it is normally.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
But… thinking back on the contents 
of that letter she showed me-

[Thanks fer th' snacks. They were tasty. Tama had some too right? 
Even without th' souvenirs, it's fine if ya just give us a call]
data.name: Letter

data.text:
Tamamo Cross' family wrote they were fine without souvenirs. 
They've probably already realized how tight her budget is.
Alright! Let's go with these 4!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
I'm fine, I already get ta eat my fill of good food. 
'Cuz of Tracen Academy, everyday I get ta eat a feast!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text: Any more luxury than this and I'll be in for a reckonin'.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Tha's why, rather than me, 
I wanna give my family somethin' tasty.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
-I thought 'bout it alot. 'Bout what I could do ta make life 
easier for 'em. An' it finally hit me… th' Twinkle Series.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
'Cuz they helped me get ta Tracen Academy, I can't go on losin'! 
It ain't good if I can't win! But even then-
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Letting her attend Tracen Academy was a blessing, 
and in return her inclination was to prioritize 
her family over everything else.

choices.text: Don't overdo it by being thrifty
Don't overdo it by being thrifty

data.text:
Are ya stupid? My thriftiness is Pro-level! 
And what's this all of a sudden? Are ya my mom?!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
Frank, ain't ya!? 
Don't say tha' with such a straight face, it's embarassin'!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

data.text:
For the sake of her family is what drives her. But, it would be 
fine to spoil herself just a little… is what I thought.
